resources.string: Welcome to Pebble Connect, this app allows your Pebble smart watch to receive notifications from the Internet using IFTTT or an API.
Once you have setup the app, you can visit the documentation to learn how to setup IFTTT or use the API
The source code can be found on GitHub.

Cloud Access allows your Pebble to receive notifications and data from the Internet. Your Pebble can be used as a channel on IFTTT or you can use the API to integrate with just about anything else. For more information please see the documentation. To use the IFTTT channel, you must enable the Wordpress channel with ofkorth.net/pebble as the domain, your username as the username and token as the password. When creating an IFTTT recipe, you should select the Wordpress create a post option. The text you enter for the title will appear as the title in the notification on your Pebble and the text entered for the body will appear as the body of the notification on your Pebble. Categories and tags can be left blank and select publish immediately.
Changing your username at anytime will invalidate you previous token and not allow it to send data to your Pebble.
You are not logged in with any Google accounts on this device. Please add a Google account before continuing.
This device does not support the required Google services. The app will now close.
